name: div
features: More Coverage: Elbow guard is 10% larger than previous version for increased protection
Ergonomic Design: Engineered for a personalized fit & maximum impact protection
Gel-to-Shell® Technology: Air-activated material transforms from gel to custom-molded shield in 30 minutes
Dispersion Technology: Deflects and disperses impact efficiently across the guard for superior protection
Custom Molding Gear: Creates a one-to-one custom fit unique to each player
Comfort Lining: Moisture-wicking interior enhances comfort & wearability
3D Cloud Mesh: Textured base material provides a modern look & added surface structure
Small and Large Sizes: Small fits arms <10", large fits arms >10" — measure bicep circumference above elbow for best fit
